name: vim-title-edit
description: Navigate to and edit file titles with Vim keybindings in Obsidian

scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -rf /Users/tal/archivum-aeternum/.obsidian/plugins/vim-title-edit && mkdir -p /Users/tal/archivum-aeternum/.obsidian/plugins/vim-title-edit && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css /Users/tal/archivum-aeternum/.obsidian/plugins/vim-title-edit/
